item.title: Urban Company IPO Fully Subscribed In Just 2 Hours; SEBI RA Sees Growth Potential Despite Valuation Risks
item.description: By 12 p.m. IST, NSE data showed bids for 10.81 crore shares against 10.67 crore shares on offer.

item.title: Oracle Stock Rally Catapults Larry Ellison Close To 'Friend' Elon Musk For Title Of World’s Richest Man
item.description: As of Tuesday’s close, the Oracle co-founder’s wealth ($295 billion) trailed that of the frontrunner, Elon Musk, by $89 billion.

item.title: Winklevoss’ Gemini Raises IPO Offering Size After Securing Nasdaq Deal
item.description: The cryptocurrency firm priced its shares between $24-$26, compared with the previous range of $17 to $19.

item.title: Why Is QMMM Stock Plunging 60% In Premarket Trading?
item.description: Tuesday’s closing price of $207 gave the firm a valuation of $11.84 billion.
